channel.title: Posts on Learning Fast
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Learning Fast

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Based on a brillant tweet I ran into today I started my tech blog journey (It was a voiceover of one of my favorite Seinfeld scenes, the car rental, showing how complex it is to setup a web site). I’ve discovered throught the years that learning fast is key to success, overall satisfaction and ultimately happiness. So let the journey begin…
